summary: The diff shows frontend UI tweaks (layout/header/footer, favicon/title) and improved menu React Query hooks with clearer errors when the backend actor is not initialized. However, there is no concrete evidence in the diff of fixing the actual deploy/publish failure or producing a working shareable deployed URL, and the required image assets are referenced but not added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Resolve the deployment/publish failure so the Version 1 POS app can be built and deployed successfully, producing a working shareable URL that loads the app UI and can make backend calls.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows frontend component/hook changes and metadata updates. There is no evidence of changes to deployment configuration, build tooling, canister settings, or backend code that would directly address publish/deployment failure or guarantee a shareable deployed URL.

missing_requirements.requirement: A fresh build completes without errors for both frontend and backend.
missing_requirements.reason: No build configuration/tooling changes or backend-related changes are shown; build success cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deployment/publish completes successfully and results in a shareable URL.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment/publish output, URL, or deployment-related code/config changes are included in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Opening the URL loads the app without a blank screen or console-fatal runtime error.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployed URL is provided and there is no evidence of runtime error fixes tied to a specific failure mode; only minor frontend changes are shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Core flows work from the deployed URL: viewing POS tab, viewing Menu tab, and at least one backend query/mutation succeeds.
missing_requirements.reason: While menu hooks are updated, the diff does not provide evidence of successful deployed backend calls or that the deployed environment works end-to-end.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide required images: pos-logo.dim_512x512.png, empty-cart.dim_1200x800.png, gift-card-illustration.dim_1200x800.png
missing_requirements.reason: The diff references the POS logo path but does not add any image files, and there is no evidence the empty-cart or gift-card illustration assets were added.

hallucinated_features.description: Added footer attribution link to caffeine.ai with a dynamic tracking parameter and a heart icon.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding external attribution/marketing links or branding in the footer.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a prominent 'Fake Money Only - For Fun!' badge in the header (including a game controller emoji).
hallucinated_features.reason: While the constraints require simulated payments, the specific new UI badge is not requested as part of REQ-12 (deployment/publish fix).

hallucinated_features.description: Changed/added favicon and updated the document title to 'Kid's POS - Fake Money Fun'.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; REQ-12 focuses on deployment/publish failure and working backend calls from a shareable URL.
